Kāyagatāsati Sutta：Preached at Jetavana，on how to cultivate mindfulness of body so that it may produce abundant fruit and the ten blessings that result there from （M．iii．88ff）．



This sutta，like the ānāpāpa，is really only a sectional presentation of the Satipatthāna Sutta．



For the special nature of this sutta see the Vibhanga Commentary （p．226）．
